response.overview: This stand-up comedy special is an invitation into a laugh-filled evening at The Crowd Theater in Chicago, Illinois-and into the imagination of an exciting and inciting comedian, Justin Golak. Throughout this hour, the third one he has recorded, Justin will present brazen views on a wide-range of topics. So, relax your heart, open your mind, and loosen your perception of the egregious. And, of course, have a great time!
response.title: Justin Golak: American Apathy
